config diskstats
multigraph diskstats_latency
graph_title Disk latency per device
graph_args --base 1000
graph_vlabel Average IO Wait (seconds)
graph_category disk
graph_width 400
sda_avgwait.label sda
sda_avgwait.type GAUGE
sda_avgwait.info Average wait time for an I/O request
sda_avgwait.min 0
sda_avgwait.draw LINE1
multigraph diskstats_utilization
graph_title Disk utilization per device
graph_args --base 1000 --lower-limit 0 --upper-limit 100 --rigid
graph_vlabel Percent
graph_category disk
graph_width 400
sda_util.label sda
sda_util.type GAUGE
sda_util.info Utilization of the device
sda_util.min 0
multigraph diskstats_throughput
graph_title Disk throughput per device
graph_args --base 1024
graph_vlabel Bytes/${graph_period} read (-) / write (+)
graph_category disk
graph_width 400
sda_rdbytes.label sda
sda_rdbytes.type GAUGE
sda_rdbytes.min 0
sda_rdbytes.draw LINE1
sda_rdbytes.graph no
sda_wrbytes.label sda
sda_wrbytes.type GAUGE
sda_wrbytes.min 0
sda_wrbytes.draw LINE1
sda_wrbytes.negative sda_rdbytes
multigraph diskstats_iops

sda_rdio.draw LINE1

multigraph diskstats_latency.sdj

svctm.info Average time an I/O takes on the block device

svctm.draw LINE1

avgwait.type GAUGE

avgrdwait.label Average Read IO Wait time
avgrdwait.type GAUGE
avgrdwait.info Average wait time for a read I/O from request start to finish (includes queue times et al)

avgrdwait.draw LINE1
avgwrwait.label Average Write IO Wait time
avgwrwait.type GAUGE
avgwrwait.info Average wait time for a write I/O from request start to finish (includes queue times et al)
